base_description: White globe on ornate stand with gold accents.
part_description: The object has a spherical globe, three ornate legs, a circular support ring, and two gold arcs. The globe sits within the ring, supported by the legs, which are evenly spaced and connected to a base.
internal_interaction_description: The globe rests within the circular support ring, allowing it to rotate. The gold arcs are attached to the ring, providing structural support and aesthetic detail. The three legs connect the ring to the base, ensuring stability and balance for the entire structure.
external_interaction_description: The globe can be manually rotated within the ring, allowing users to view different sections. It serves as a decorative piece and an educational tool, interacting with viewers by providing visual and tactile engagement. The sturdy base ensures it remains stationary on flat surfaces.
